short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to find weather info for any location!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Weather extension is popular among users who seek quick and convenient access to weather information without the need to navigate to dedicated weather websites or applications. This Extension display temperature of multiple cities based on user's input. There is a Badge icon that updates hourly with the temperature of user's home city . Along with that, there is a Weather overlay that can be display on a webpage as user is browsing  and it is controllable through the popup or settings . Also, user can switch between metric and imperial temperature units.
